title: Bug 114905: Default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying it
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a report parameter and set its Display type to List Box.
2. Enter three values: "aa", "bb", "cc", and set "aa" as the default value. Click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog and modify the default value from "aa" to "aaa". Click OK.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5. <Add further steps to reproduce here>
